She already borrowed two loans from the MFI HOPE DRC for business expansion and fully repaid both loans. With the next loan, Annie will be able to meet the customer demand and generate additional profits. Her business makes US$30 of profit per week. One of Annie’s strategies to keep her clients is that she tells them in advance about any changes that can occur in business. Her ambition is to become a provider in her environment. Annie is 37 years old, divorced and has four children aged between 13 and 23 years old. Two of them attend school.

loans.use: to increase the inventory of her business by buying more palm oil and seeds of corn to resell at profit

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Yar

texts.en:
Yar is a 28-year-old married woman with no children. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for four years.

Yar is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale

loans.name: Maria Yaneth

texts.es:
María, vive con sus dos hijos, su casa es propia, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales y tortillas, este negocio tiene ya 5 años de existir, realiza las ventas en el mercado municipal, todos los días de la semana.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña, maíz, cal, entre otros; con estos insumos tendrá la capacidad para aumentar la producción de las tortillas.
El objetivo de María al iniciar el trabajo con préstamos, es que su negocio se vea beneficiado, mejorando la capacidad para generar más ventas.
texts.en:
María lives with her two children, in her own house. She works selling tamales and tortillas. The business has existed for 5 years. She sells in the town market every day of the week.

Currently she is asking for a loan in order to buy wood, corn, lime and other items. With these supplies she will have the ability to increase the production of tortillas.

María’s objective is to begin working through loans, as her business could benefit by improving the ability to generate more sales.

loans.use: to buy wood, corn, lime and other items for resale

loans.name: Dalmecia

texts.es: La socia Dalmecia, continua con su negocio de elaboracion de  collares, elaboradas con semillas naturales. La socia sigue trabajndo con empeño para sacar adelante a su familia y darles mejor calidad de vida, la socia tiene un pedido muy importante y desea confeccionar mil collares con pepas naturales de frutos y con listones, para ello la socia invertira el prestamo en la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de los collares.
texts.en:
Dalmecia continues with her business of making necklaces, making them from natural seeds. 

The member continues working with commitment to bring up her family and give them a better quality of life. 

The member has a very important order and wants to make a thousand necklaces with natural seeds from fruit and with ribbons, and because of this the member will invest the loan in the purchase of materials for making the necklaces.

loans.use: to buy materials to make necklaces

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 30 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona amigable, solidaria, responsable y muy trabajadora. María es soltera, vive con su madre en San Gabriel en la Provincia del Carchí.

María trabaja sola en la crianza de animales (cerdos), es el segundo crédito que realiza a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de balanceado para la alimentación de sus cerdos ya que necesita engordarles porque se acercan ferias y quiere vender para obtener mejores ingresos que mejoraran su calidad de vida y podrá cubrir las necesidades de ella y de su mamá.

Su sueño es poder costruir su propia casa y aumentar la cantidad de cerdos.
texts.en:
María is a 30 year old woman who is known for being friendly, supportive, responsable, and very hard-working.  María is single, and she lives with her mother in San Gabriel in the Carchí Province.

María works alone raising animals (pigs).  This is her second loan with Fodemi.  She will use the loan to buy balanced feed for her pigs.  She needs to fatten them because the fairs are coming up.  She wants to sell them and get better income to improve her quality of life and to be able to cover her expenses and her mother’s expenses.

Her dream is to be able to build her own house and to increase the number of pigs that she has.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals because she needs to fatten them to sell.

loans.name: Teo

texts.en:
Teo lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and all her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees, paying utility bills and rent.

Teo operates a retail shop in a location that she rents. She has been in this business for the last 7 years. She works 7 days a week. She has requested a loan of 600,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bags of sugar, rice, flour and cooking oil. Her major business challenges are transportation, seasonality and thieves. Her aspirations and goals are to own a wholesale shop and get enough profits to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, rice, flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Ding

texts.en: Ding is a 29-year-old married woman with no children. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for 4 years. Ding is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a 50-year-old beauty salon owner in Mombasa. She is married and has been running her business successfully for the past two years.

This marks her second loan from KADET LTD to finance her business. She plans to purchase new blow dryers, hair tongs, and hair rollers. 

She will use the anticipated profits to repay her loan and purchase a piece of land to construct rental houses. She hopes to have a more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase new blow dryers, hair tongs, and hair rollers

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a 31-year-old lady from the Kondele area of Kisumu city. She is married to Fredrick, and they have three children aged six months to 10 years.

Ruth operates a tailoring business in Kisumu City. She has been doing this for the last five years, making a monthly profit of KES 12,000. 

She is taking a second loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy textiles, materials, and threads. Ruth will use her profits to expand her business. Her dream is to own a tailoring school.

loans.use: to buy textiles and threads.

loans.name: Rosalio

texts.es: El socio Rosalio, continua brindando el servioc de taxi y el sigue a cargo de sus unidad como chofer; el socio es taxista independientey el socio cada 4 meses le hace el mantenimiento respectivo a sus unidad vehicular, el socio requiere el prestamo en esta ocasión pra cubrir los gastos de la revision y mantenimiento de us unidad vehicular.
texts.en: Rosalio continues to operate his taxi service and continues to drive his own vehicle. He is an independent taxi driver, and every four months he has his vehicle serviced. He requests a loan at this time to cover the costs of inspecting and servicing his vehicle.

loans.use: to cover the costs of inspecting and servicing his vehicle.

loans.name: Blanca Lilian

texts.es:
Blanca, administra una tienda de productos domésticos, es madre de tres hijos de 17, 19 y 22 años de edad, el negocio lo tiene instalado en la vivienda, surgió por la necesidad de tener ingresos, tiene ya 4 años de tenerlo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de la canasta básica, para fortalecer el negocio, surtiéndolo de arroz, frijoles, avena, huevos, gaseosas, leche en polvo, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el inventario y ofrecerle a los clientes productos de calidad.
El objetivo de Blanca es trabajar con el préstamo para hacer crecer el negocio, ya que esto le generara mayor venta y atender a los clientes de mejor manera.
texts.en:
Blanca is the mother of three children, aged seventeen, nineteen, and twenty-two, and runs a store that sells products used in the home. The business, which is located in her home, began as a result of the necessity to earn income. She has had it for four years.
She is requesting the current loan to purchase staple products such as rice, beans, oats, eggs, soda pop, and powdered milk, thereby strengthening her business, as well as helping her to improve her inventory and to offer her customers quality products. Blanca’s goal is to work with the loan to grow her business, especially since this will help her to generate greater sales and provide for her customers in the best way possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, oats, eggs, soda pop, and powdered milk.

loans.name: Tatul

texts.en:
Tatul was born in 1982 in Sevkar village, Tavush region. After serving in the Armenian army, he graduated from Yerevan State University Ijevan branch, where he learned psychology and pedagogy. Tatul couldn’t find appropriate work in his specialty and now he works as a driver. He is married and has two small sons. Tatul's parents also live with them.

Simultaneously with his regular work, Tatul and his family are engaged in farming. On their farm they breed cows, pigs, hens and turkeys. Also, they have a hothouse and garden where Tatul grows fruits and vegetables. He has a plot of land where he grows wheat. Tatul and his family use part of their agricultural products for their own needs, and reminder they sell to support the family. 

Tatul is asking for a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy a tractor which will allow him to hasten his field operations, such as sowing and harvesting.

loans.use: to buy a tractor

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is a 37-year-old lady from Kapune area of Kilgoris town, in the western part of Kenya. She is married to Patrick and they have five children, ages 4 to 16 years.

Florence runs a cereal business, mainly maize cereal; a business she has been doing for the last 6 years. She is taking a second loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy maize cereal stock.

She will reinvest her profits back into her business. Her dream is to expand her business and stock more varieties of cereals.

loans.use: to buy a stock of maize cereal for sale

loans.name: Rodah

texts.en:
Rodah is a 42-year-old lady from the Kapune area of Kilgoris town. She is married to Joseph and they have 5 children between 10 and 18 years old.

Rodah operates a milk-selling business, a business she has done for the last 6 years making a monthly income of 8,150 KES. She is taking a second loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy a dairy cow. 

She intends to use her profits to diversify into farming. Her dream is to own several dairy cows.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a 22-year-old lady from Kisumu City. She is married to a businessman, George, and they have two children, aged two and three years.

Lydia operates a book-selling business in the heart of Kisumu City. She has been in this business for the last six years and makes a monthly income of KES 10,000.

She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use buy new books and second-hand textbooks for secondary school. She will use her profits to educate her children. Her dream is to have a big bookshop.

loans.use: To buy secondary school textbooks.

loans.name: Abigael

texts.en:
Abigael is a 40-year-old lady from the Manyatta estate of Kisumu City. She is married to John and they have two children.

Abigael sells textiles and shawls. She has been in this business for one year, making a monthly income of KES 20,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy textiles and materials used for dressmaking. 

Abigael will use her profits to expand her business. Her dream is to open a boutique where she can sell her goods.

loans.use: to buy textiles and materials used for dressmaking.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is a 26-year-old man from the Corner Legio area of Kisumu City. He is married to Caroline, and they have two children, aged one and two years.

Bernard operates a butchery. He has been in this business for the last three years, making a monthly income of KES 10,000. He is taking his first loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy meat to sell.

He will use his profits to educate his children. His dream is to have many butchery outlets within Kisumu City.

loans.use: to buy fresh meat for the butcher shop.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es: Pedro Pablo tiene 43 años de edad, el tiene su negocio que es la venta de leña y carbón, el recibe el apoyo de su esposa que es maestra de una escuela de la comunidad donde habitan. Juntos han sacado a sus hijos adelante con mucho esfuerzos. Pedro Pablo está solicitando financiamiento para su vivienda lo cual construirá un anexo para la vivienda, el comprara con el crédito cemento, hierro, arena entre otros materiales de construcción.
texts.en: Pedro Pablo is 43 years old. He has a business selling wood and charcoal. He has the support of his wife who is a teacher in a school in the community where they live. Together, they have worked hard to bring-up their children. Pedro Pablo is requesting a loan to build an addition to his home. He will use the loan to buy cement, iron, sand, and other construction materials.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, sand, and other construction materials.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has one child. 

Emmanuel is providing motorela (a motorcycle encased in a carriage with two rows of seats facing each other) or motorcycle services. He has had this business for two years. He requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services.

Emmanuel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, he hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services.

loans.name: Esmeralda Yaneth

texts.es:
Esmeralda, vive con su familia, es madre de dos hijos de 12 y 16 años de edad, ella tiene una tortillería y vende pupusas, este negocio lo tiene en la casa de habitación, no hay un horario específico para atender, pues todo depende de la clientela, tiene ya 5 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, frijoles, quesillo, chicharrón, condimentes, harina, aceite, todos estos materiales los podrá obtener por medio del préstamo, que será una gran ayuda para Esmeralda y para el funcionamiento del negocio.
La aspiración de ella es en un futuro ampliar la vivienda, de las ganancias del negocio, para vivir más cómodamente.
texts.en:
Esmeralda lives with her family, and has two children, aged twelve and sixteen. She has a tortillería and sells pupusas [stuffed tortillas]. Her business is located in the house where she lives. She has no fixed working hours since everything depends on customer demand, and has been working this way for five years.
She is currently requesting a loan to purchase corn, beans, quesillo [tortillas stuffed with cream cheese], chicharrón [pork skins], condiments, flour, and oil. She will be able to obtain all these products through the loan, which will be of great help to Esmeralda and for her business’ functioning. Her aspiration is to use her business earnings to increase the size of her house someday in the future, so she may live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans, quesillo [tortillas stuffed with cream cheese], chicharrón [pork skins], condiments, flour, and oil.

loans.name: Jose Wilian

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 15 y 10 años de edad, él se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, lleva ya 10 años en este oficio, trabajando junto con su esposa y de este negocio han logrado vivir por un buen tiempo, cubriendo sus necesidades básicas.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para complementar el valor de una motocicleta, que utilizara para repartir pan, con esta compra que le permitirá hacer el dinero del préstamo, José va a poder distribuir con más facilidad y a más zonas el pan.
La aspiración de José es prosperar con el negocio, contribuir al desarrollo de su familia y seguir contando con la ayuda de financiamientos para lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children, who are 15 and 10 years old.  He makes and sells bread for a living.  He has been in this trade for 10 years, working together with his wife.  This is the business that has allowed them to live for a while now, as it covers their basic needs.

He is asking for this loan to cover the cost of a motorcycle that he will use to deliver bread.  With this purchase, which the loan will allow him to make, José will be able to deliver bread more easily and to more areas.

José's aspiration is to make his business thrive, to contribute to his family's development, and to keep counting on help from financing to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his bakery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tamarind.

loans.name: Karla Maria

texts.es: Karla Maria 29 años de edad, es una emprendedora que inicio su negocio de venta de mercadería en general que con mucho esfuerzo y con fondos propios, ya que ella quería apoyar a su esposo en los gastos de la familia, y poder sacar a sus hijos a delante juntos. Karla está solicitando financiamiento para comprar variedad de ropa, sandalias, camisas de varón y de mujer, y variedad de cosméticos.
texts.en: Karla María, 29, is an entrepreneur who started her own business selling general merchandise with much effort and with her own funds because she wanted to help her husband with household expenses and support their children together.  Karla is asking for financing to buy a variety of clothes, sandals, men's and women's shirts and assorted cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes, sandals, men's and women's shirts and assorted cosmetics.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 31 years old and from Nakuru. She is married to George and they have three children in Primary School.

Judith has a food stall where she sells bananas. She has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy more bananas to add to her stock.

She hopes to expand her business and open a bigger stall.

loans.use: to buy more bananas for sale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 42-year-old married man with 3 children, 2 of whom attend school while the other is still too young for school. He lives in a rental house with electricity but no piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food for his family and school fees for his children. 

Joseph has operated as a taxi driver for the past 6 years; his potential clients are local area residents. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of owning another taxi in the future.

With the 40,000 KES, he wants to purchase blocks, sand and cement for building his home. He decided to join Yehu to access funds to improve his living standards and build a permanent home for his family.

loans.use: to purchase blocks, sand and cement for building his home

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a married man with 1 child who is enrolled in school. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family. 

Mohammed has operated a motorcycle transportation business for the past 2 years, operating from home to the market. His potential clients are the local area residents. Mohammed faces a major challenge of competition from other motorbike transport operators. He dreams of expanding his business.

Mohammed plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to start up a retail shop for his wife by purchasing stocks of wheat and maize flour, rice and sugar. He decided to join Yehu to access capital to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to start up a retail shop for his wife by purchasing stocks of wheat and maize flour, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Rosa Lili

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con sus dos hijos, se dedica a la venta de pan, este oficio inicio por la necesidad de tener ingresos para la subsistencia de su familia, trabaja desde hace 3 años y hasta la fecha no ha tenido inconvenientes y a sus hijos no les ha faltado lo más necesario.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de Pan, ya que el negocio consiste en que distribuye o vende en las zonas cercanas el pan de una panadería, a quien le compra el pan todos los días para salir a la reventa.
Este préstamo le ayudara para mantener el dinero y realizar las comprar periódicas de pan y así mantenerse en el negocio. Ella quiere sacar a sus hijos adelante, pues su sueño es verlos desarrollados.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her two children; she’s a bread merchant.  This occupation arose because she needed to earn income to support her family.  She has been in business three years and to date has had no problems and her children have had the basics.

She’s asking for a loan to buy bread since her business consists in distributing or selling in areas near a bakery that she buys bread from every day to resell.

This loan will help her keep money and be able to make periodic bread purchases to stay in business.  She wants to move her children forward for her dream is to see them developed.

loans.use: to buy bread to sell.

loans.name: Mirna Guadalupe

texts.es:
Mirna, vive con su esposo y su hija de un año de edad, administra una tienda de consumo, su horario es de 6:00am a 7:00pm, este surgió por iniciativa propia, con la intensión de generar ingresos para su hogar, los materiales que ofrece son como aceite, arroz, embutidos entre otros.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de más mercadería como harinas, refrescos artificiales, huevos, pollo, con esta inversión ayudara a proveer más y mejores productos a los clientes, tambien generara mayor ventas para apoyar a su familia con los ingresos.
Ella quiere ir creciendo, con la ayuda de los prestamos espera que si se pueda, además de facilitar para su hija los ingresos para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Mirna lives with her husband and one-year-old daughter.  She runs a grocery store.  Her schedule is 6am to 7pm.  It arose by her own initiative aiming at generating household income.  The products she offers are oil, rice, cured meats, among others.

She is currently asking for a loan to buy more merchandise like flour, soft-drinks, eggs and chicken.  This investment will help her provide more and better products for her customers.  It will also generate higher sales to support her family with the income.

She wants to continue growing and hopes that will help from the loans she’ll be able to do so in addition to earning income for her daughter’s development.

loans.use: to buy flour, soft-drinks, eggs and chicken.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, solamente él trabaja en la casa, sembrando maíz y frijol, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre cuando aún estaba soltero, trababa en tierras alquiladas, no tiene  un horario fijo.
Él comprara insumos para preparar la tierra, por eso solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, con ellos estará dispuesto a iniciar las labores agrícolas de la temporada, esta compra será muy buena para Raúl.
La aspiración de Raúl es tener un negocio agrícola mejor, con las cosechas abundantes para saciar las necesidades de su familia y al mismo tiempo proveer para los clientes.
texts.en:
Raúl is a farmer.  He lives with his wife and three children; he’s the only one who works planting corn and beans, an occupation he learned from his father when he was still single.  He works on leased lands and he does not have a fixed schedule.

He will buy supplies to prepare the soil so is asking for a loan to buy manure and herbicides to be ready to start the seasonal farming tasks.  This purchase will be very good for Raúl.

Raúl's hope is to have a better farming business with abundant harvest to meet his family’s needs while at the same time providing for his customers.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, se dedica a la venta de atol, vive en casa familiar con sus hijos de 7 y 10 años de edad, ella se dedica a este negocio por la necesidad de tener una ocupación que le genere ingresos para las necesidades de sus hijos, su horario es de 6:00am á 10:00am.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, leche, harina, canela, azúcar, para la elaboración de atol, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio y con los materiales para seguir adelante.
La aspiración de Elizabeth es crear un buen historial de crédito, para que con este apoyo pueda crecer con sus ventas y así mejorar su apoyo a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth sells atol for a living.  She lives in the family home with her children, who are seven and ten years old.  She does this work for a living because she needs to have an occupation that makes money for her children's needs.  Her schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 10 a.m.

She is asking for a loan to buy corn, milk, flour, cinnamon, and sugar to make atol.  This investment will help her improve availability in her business and with these ingredients she will be able to get ahead.

Elizabeth's aspiration is to establish a good credit history so that she will be able to use this help to increase her sales and improve her ability to support her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, milk, flour, cinnamon, and sugar

loans.name: Wilgean

texts.en:
Wilgean is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Wilgean has a shop that sells clothing like t-shirts & blouses. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy clothing like shirts & blouses to sell.
Wilgean has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future,Wilgean hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing like shirts & blouses to sell

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward paid back his previous loan well and in good time.The business is doing great

This is Edward’s second business loan from KADET LTD . He plans to open a retail shop business, he will use the anticipated profits to repay his loan and educate his children. He hopes to have a happier family.

loans.use: to add stock of sugar, cooking oil, maize flour and wheat flour for his retail store and to buy a dust board for his motorcycle transport business.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 43 years old from Olkalou and is married with three children who are in primary school.

Richard has a motorcycle business that he has been doing for the past two years. He has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy another motorbike to help in the business.

He hopes to own many more motorcycles and see his business expand.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Raffy

texts.en:
Raffy  is 22 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 1 child. 
Raffy  is providing motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 3 years. He requested a loan for 8,000 to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for the services.
Raffy  has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Raffy hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for his mortorcycle transport service

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 
Julieta has a shop that sells frozen meat fish in a variety of fish. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy frozen meat fish to sell.
Julieta has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Julieta hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy frozen meat fish to sell

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 38 years old from Nakuru and is married to James, they have two children.

Jane has a retail shop and she has applied for a loan from KADET LTD , to enable her pay school fees. She is looking forward to getting the loan to help her pay fees for her son.

She hopes to see her children get good education.

loans.use: To pay school fees.

loans.name: Mauricio Antonio

texts.es:
Mauricio, vive con su madre, su esposa, y dos hijos, la ocupación de Mauricio es la crianza de cerdos, este oficio y negocio lo aprendió para manejar un ingreso para su familia, no tiene un horario establecido, ya que la granja está ubicada en la casa de habitación. 
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos, este préstamo le dará los recursos para poder obtener los cerdos y aumentar la granja.
El objetivo de Mauricio es tener éxito en el negocio, engordar los cerdos y comercializarlos a buen precio, proveyendo así más ingresos para la familia.
texts.en:
Mauricio lives with his mother, his wife and his two children.  He raises pigs, an occupation and business he learned in order to earn family income.  He does not have a fixed work schedule since the farm is located at home.

He’s asking for a loan to buy pigs and feed concentrate for them.  This loan will give him the necessary resources to obtain pigs and to increase his herd size.

Mauricio’s goal is to have a successful business, to fatten up the pigs and to sell them at a good price thus providing more income for the family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con sus hijos de 20 y 12 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, atiende un puesto en el mercado municipal desde las 11:00am, hasta que logra vender todas las tortillas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, gas, leña, para la elaboración de la venta de tortillas, este préstamo le servirá para mejora la disponibilidad de los materiales necesarios para continuar en el negocio.
La aspiración de Rosa es seguir en el negocio, para llevar el sustento a sus hijos, y cubrir los gastos y servicios del hogar.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her children who are 20 and 12 years old.  She sells tortillas.  She tends to a stand in the municipal market from 11am until she sells out all the tortillas.

She’s asking for the loan to buy corn, gas and firewood to make tortillas to sell.  This loan will help her improve supplies of necessary ingredients to continue in business.

Rosa’s hope is to stay in business to provide sustenance for her children and to cover expenses and household utilities costs.

loans.use: to buy corn, gas and firewood.

loans.name: Alma Iris

texts.es:
Alma, se dedica a la venta de bebidas refrescantes, vive con sus tres hijas y su madre, una de sus hijas es enfermera, las otras están estudiando, Alma se dedica a la venta de bebidas refrescantes, dicho negocio está instalado en el mercado municipal, lleva 10 años en el negocio, lo aprendió de sus padres.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, jugos, gatorade, para surtir el negocio, esta compra le ayudara para incrementar el negocio y mejorar la atención a los clientes.
La aspiración de Alma es fortalecer el negocio, brindarle mayor seguridad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Alma sells refreshing beverages.  She lives with her three daughters and her mother.  One of her daughters is a nurse and the others are attending school.  Alma sells refreshing beverages in the municipal market; she’s been in business ten years having learned it from her parents.

She is asking for a loan to buy soft-drinks, juice and Gatorade to stock the business.  This purchase will help her increase business and improve customer service.  Her goal is to strengthen the business and provide better economic security to her family.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, juice and Gatorade.

loans.name: Leonor Isabel

texts.es:
Leonor, vive con sus dos hijos, ya están adultos, ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y enchape, desde hace 5 años trabaja en este negocio, ya tiene clientes bien definidos, con este negocio se mantiene cubriendo los gastos necesarios.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de joyas enchapadas como aretes, anillos, cadenas, para surtir el negocio y así tener mayor variedad para los clientes, manteniendo la preferencia de los clientes.
Ella quiere tener una buena experiencia con este préstamo, esperando que pueda pagar bien y que su negocio sea cada vez más prospero.
texts.en:
Leonor lives with her two adult children.  She sells cosmetics and plated jewelry.  She has been doing this work for five years and she now has well established customer.  She lives off of this business, as it covers her necessary expenses.

She is asking for a loan to buy plated jewelry, such as earrings, rings, and chains, to stock her business, have a wider variety for her customers, and keep her customers' preference on hand.

She wants to have a good experience with this loan and hopes to be able to make her payments and that her business will thrive more and more.

loans.use: to buy plated earrings, rings, and chains

loans.name: Maria Stella

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de verduras, tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos los cuales están estudiando, ella administra una tienda de verdura fresca, tambien cría cerdos para vender, dichos negocios los tiene en su casa de habitación, esto le permite atender la clientela de la zona, ya que vive fuera de la ciudad.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en verdura: papas, güisquiles, yuca, zanahorias, entre otras que son necesarias para ofrecer a los clientes, con este préstamo lograra realizar una buena compra que le estabilice el negocio y le genere mejores ventas.
Ella quiere crecer y espera realizarlo a través del préstamo, mejorando su condición económica y el apoyo a su familia.
texts.en:
María sells vegetables.  She is 43 years old, and she lives with her husband and their two children.  The children go to school.  She runs a fresh vegetable store, and she also raises pigs to sell.  She has these businesses at her house.  This allows her to tend to the clientele in the area because she lives outside of the city.

She is requesting a loan to invest in vegetables like potatoes, chayote, yucca, carrots, and others that she needs to offer her customers.  With this loan she will manage to make a good purchase that will stabilize her business and generate better sales for her.

She wants to grow, and she hopes to do so through the loan.  She will be improving her financial situation and the support of her family.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, chayote, yucca, and carrots.

loans.name: Eveliza

texts.en:
Eveliza is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. 

Eveliza has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Eveliza has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Mary Grace has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Mary Grace has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Mary Grace hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Judith has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Judith has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future,Judith hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Ephantus

texts.en:
Ephantus is 37 years old business man, he is married to Jane a farmer. They are blessed with three children. He has been running a retail shop for the past four years with the monthly income of KES 15,000 which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his fourth loan term with KADET LTD , after repaying the previous loan successfully. Ephantus will use the loan to buy a stock of sugar and rice for his shop. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy a stock of sugar and rice for his shop

loans.name: Ethel Jane

texts.en:
Ethel Jane is 19 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Ethel Jane has a shop that sells scraps like plastic bottles & metals. She has had this business for a year. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy recycled materials like plastics & metals to sell.
Ethel Jane has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Ethel Jane hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy recycled materials like plastics & metals to sell

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María, administra una carnicería, ella vive en casa propia, tiene una hija, se dedica a la venta de carne desde hace 6 años, este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia.
Actualmente María está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de carne para reventa, este préstamo le ayudara para tener el dinero necesario para surtir el negocio de carne fresca, con la intención de mejorar sus ingresos.
El objetivo de María es tener mejores oportunidades con el negocio, creciendo y estabilizándose en el mercado, además que este progreso le ayudara con su familia.
texts.en:
María runs a butcher shop.  She lives in her own house and has a daughter.  She has been selling meat for six years.  The business arose thanks to her own initiative.

María is asking for a loan at present to buy meat to resell.  This loan will help her have the necessary money to stock the business with fresh meat with the goal of improving income.

María’s goal is to have better opportunities with the business, to grow and stabilize in the marketplace as well as helping her family with this progress.

loans.use: to buy meat to resell.

loans.name: Walter Jeovanni

texts.es:
Walter, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, además le acompaña los hermanos de la esposa, él administra un taller de reparación de bicicletas y de estructuras metálicas, el negocio surgió para tener ingresos para la familia, lleva 5 años de tenerlo, pero ha logrado mejorarlo desde hace dos años.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de repuestos de bicicletas como cables, cadenas, asientos, tubos, y además comprara repuestos de mecánica, esto le ayudara para darle más capacidad al taller, fortaleciéndolo para desempeñar mejor el trabajo.
Su propósito es que su familia cuente con una fuente ingresos estables, como lo es el taller, por eso se preocupa para mantenerlo en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Walter lives with his wife and three children as well as with his wife’s siblings.  He runs a bicycle and metal structures repair shop.  The business arose in order to have income for the family.  He’s had it for five years but managed to improve it two years ago.

He’s asking for a loan to buy bicycle spare parts like cables, chains, seats and inner tubes.  He will also buy machine shop parts which will help his shop have greater capacity strengthening it so that it can do better work.

His goal is that his family has a stable source of income like the repair shop is and this is why he strives to keep it in good condition.

loans.use: to buy bicycle cables, chains, seats, inner tubes.

loans.name: Santos Gilberto

texts.es:
Santos, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, vive con su familia, tiene una hija de 8 años de edad, desde hace 15 años esta en este negocio, dedicándose a la compra y venta de productos del mar.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mariscos frescos, pescado en distintas especies, camarones, con esta compra mantendrá producto fresco y con la ayuda del préstamo tambien podrá tener mayor facilidad para realizar la compra.
El objetivo de Santos es que con la compra pueda tener mayores ventas y ganancias para solventar algunas necesidades en su familia, así como pagar las cuotas del préstamo.
texts.en:
Santos sells seafood. He lives with his family and he has a 8-year-old daughter. He has been working in this field for 15 years, buying and selling seafood products.
He is requesting a loan to buy fresh seafood such as different species of fish and shrimps. Thanks to this purchase he will keep on selling fresh products, and with the loan it will be also easier for him to purchase the products.
Santo’s goal is for his products to sell more, so that he will earn more money to pay for some necessities of his family, as well as to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy fresh seafood such as different species of fish and shrimps.

loans.name: Kathya

texts.es: Kathya tiene 30 años, es una mujer amable y buena. Convive con su pareja David de 30 años, y juntos tienen un hijo de tres años, y es por él que trabajan mucho para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Kathya consiste en la venta de bebidas, es así que a diario el camión repartidor visita su puesto para saber cuantas cajas o packs de bebidas desea para vender durante el día. Ella como todo negociante, pide lo principal con el fin de no tener su inversión estancada por mucho tiempo. De esa manera, desde que empezó hace dos años y hasta el día de hoy, realiza ésta actividad. Asimismo le gusta por que la convierte en una mujer independiete y aporta en la econmía de su hogar. Recuerdo que cuando se inició solo vendía un par de cajas, ahora se abastecw de variedad de sabores y tamaños de bebidas. Su meta ahora es seguir creciendo hasta lograr tener su mini distribuidora. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en el crédito anterior. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará bebidas en mayor cantidad ya que por la época de calor en la zona tiene mas ventas y desea estar preparada para poder abastecerse.
texts.en: Kathya is 30 years old.  She is a kind, good woman.  She lives with her partner David, who is 30 years old, and together they have a three-year-old son who is the reason they work so much: to offer him a better quality of life.  Kathya's work consists of selling drinks.  As such, the delivery truck comes to her stand daily to find out how many cases or packs of drinks she wants to sell throughout the day.  Like all business people, she orders the essential so that her investment won't be held up for a long time.  Thus, since she started two years ago up until today, she does this for a living.  She also likes the work because it has made her an independent woman and it contributes to her home finances.  She remembers that when she started on her own she would only sell a couple of cases and now she stocks a variety of flavors and sizes of drinks.  Her goal now is to keep growing until she is able to have a mini distribution company.  This will be her second loan with MFP and she counts on their collaboration to continue with her objectives.  She also promises to make her payments on time again, as she did with her previous loan.  With the requested 1,000 nuevos soles, she will buy larger quantities of drinks because during the hot season in her area she will make more sales and she wants to be prepared to be able to stock up.

loans.use: to buy more cases of drinks

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi  operates a chop bar (where a variety of African dishes are sold), she has done this for 10 years.   The food she serves are rice and meat soup,   banku and fish soup,  and rice balls. She is married to a farmer and has 6 dependents.   Esi uses her income to support the husband to pay their children’s  school fees. She will use her loan to purchase bags of rice, meat and other ingredient to prepare food for sale. With the new profit, Esi plans to operate a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, meat and other ingredient to prepare food for sale

loans.name: Mardy

texts.en:
Mardy is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Mardy has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Mardy has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Mardy hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 44 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Josephine has a shop that sells beauty products & food supplements. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks from AVON & MOREISHI to sell.
Josephine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Josephine hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks from AVON & MOREISHI to sell

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 40 years old and is married with three children who are all in Primary School.

Joseph is a farmer and has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD, to enable him do some farming. He is optimistic that the loan will help boost his business, by buying plowing materials.
 
He hopes to expand his business and improve his living standard through the profits made.

loans.use: to buy plowing materials.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 61 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 6 children. 
Victoria has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Victoria has been a member of HSPFI since 2008.  In the future, Victoria hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 
Daisy has a shop that makes & sells rugs . She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy used clothing needed for making rugs.
Daisy has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 .  In the future, Daisy hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy used clothing needed for making rugs

loans.name: Ashuku

texts.en:
Ashuku is 39 years old from Nakuru and is married to Catherine. They have two sons who are in Primary School.

Ashuku has a business of selling different accessories like belts, mirrors,combs etc. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him add stock to his business. 

Ashuku hopes to be able to open a shop where he can sell his products instead of going door to door to sell them.

loans.use: To buy mirrors,combs,belts etc

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Jocelyn has a shop that makes and sells rags. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 8,000 Philippines pesos to buy cloth needed for making rags.

Jocelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Jocelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy cloth needed for making rags.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en:
Gabriel is 31 years old and married to Pauline; they have four children aged from 8 months to 9 years.

Gabriel is a mechanic and has been there for the past 10 years. He is applying for his first loan to enable him to buy spare parts to enable him to give better services to his customers.

He hopes to own a car garage in the near future.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for sale.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Corazon has a shop that sells clothing, food supplements like Vitamin-C, & cosmetics . She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 14,000 to buy stocks of beauty & food supplement products.
Corazon has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Corazon hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of beauty & food supplement products

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
María, es ama de casa, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 6, 7 y 9 años de edad, el esposo de María es agricultor y ella le ayuda en algunas ocupaciones, trabajando juntos para la siembra de maíz, tiene 10 años de estar en este oficio.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para el alquiler del terreno donde se disponen a sembrar, con este dinero podrán tener la seguridad de contar con un sitio seguro donde puedan realizar el cultivo.
El objetivo de María es trabajar bien con este préstamo, mantener un buen record, que el proceso de la siembra sea el correcto para obtener buena cosecha.
texts.en:
María is a housewife. She lives with her husband and three children 6, 7, and 9 years old. 

Her husband is a farmer and she helps him in some of the chores, working together in order to plant corn. She has been doing this work for 10 years. 

She is asking for a loan in order to rent land which is ready to plant. With this money she could have the security of having a secure place to grow the crop. 

María’s objectives are to work well with the loan, to maintain a good record, and make the growing process conducive to obtaining a good harvest.

loans.use: to rent land

loans.name: Brenda Rocio

texts.es:
Brenda, es comerciante de ropa americana, tiene 20 años de edad, vive con su madre y su abuela, este negocio lo aprendió  de su tía, lo realiza de forma ambulante, recorriendo varias calles.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra ropa americana, más que todo en blusas, faldas, pantalones, con este préstamo lograra surtir el negocio, mejorando la disponibilidad y variedad para ofrecer a los clientes.
El objetivo de Brenda es por medio del préstamo fortalecer el negocio y mejorar la atención  a los clientes con el fin de generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
Brenda is a retailer selling American clothing. She is 20 years old and she lives with her mother and her grandmother. Her aunt taught her how to do this job, and she sells door to door, walking along different streets.
She is requesting a long to buy American clothing, especially blouses, skirts and trousers. Thanks to this loan she will be able to supply her stock, improving the availability and the variety of products to sell to her customers.
Brenda’s goal is to strengthen her activity thanks to the loan, and to improve the service to her customers in order to increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy blouses, skirts and trousers.

loans.name: Karla Vanesa

texts.es: Karla Vanesa tiene 29 años de edad, su actividad a la que se dedica es la venta de mercadería en general, esta actividad la realiza de manera ambulante, ya tiene a sus clientes a quien le ofrece su productos, ella tiene experiencia en el negocio lo cual sus clientes la visitan por la calidad que le ofrece y el servicio. Karla Vanesa está solicitando financiamiento para comprar pantalones, camisa, faldas, sandalias y cosméticos entre otros que es lo que piden sus clientes.
texts.en: Karla Vanesa is 29 years old.  The work she does for a living is selling general merchandise.  She does this work on foot and she now has customers to whom she offers her products.  She has experience in this business, which is why her customers go to her:  for the quality she offers and the service.  Karla Vanesa is asking for financing to buy pants, tops, skirts, sandals, and cosmetics, among other things, which are what her customers ask for.

loans.use: to buy pants, tops, skirts, sandals, and cosmetics, among other things

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a polisher

loans.name: Merlibeth

texts.en:
Merlibeth is 24 years old, married and lives in the Philippines.  
Merlibeth has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 6 years. She has requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Merlibeth has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Merlibeth hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sale

loans.name: Jacob

texts.en:
Jacob is 35 years old from Ndunyu Njeru and is married with five children who are all in primary school.

Jacob has had a grocery business for the past three years. He has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable to him to buy assorted vegetables from farmers for sale to boost his grocery business. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend.

Jacob hopes to expand his business and make enough profit to enable him take care of his family.

loans.use: To buy assorted vegetables from farmers for sale

loans.name: Emelinda

texts.en:
Emelinda is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 
Emelinda has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Emelinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Emelinda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building materials.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Leah has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She has requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Leah has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Leah hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sale

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 30 years old from Ndunyu Njeru and is a single man.

John has a motorcycle transport business that he runs and has applied for a loan from KADET LTD, to enable him be able to cater for the service charges of his bike. 

He is optimistic that the motorbike will function well and enable him to carry his customers with ease. He hopes to expand his business and buy mini- buses.

loans.use: To service his motorbike.

loans.name: Aheistra

texts.en:
Aheistra is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. 
Aheistra has a shop that sells electronic loads of different networks. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy electronic loads for sell.
Aheistra has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Aheistra hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy electronic loads for sell

loans.name: Regina

texts.en: Regina  lives in Kampala, Uganda .She is widowed with four children and all her children go to school. She has two additional family members (sister). She is a tailor at the market. She has been in business for over 10 years. She works six days a week. She has requested for loan of 1000,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy new clothes and materials. Her major business challenge are defaulters, transportation and seasonality. Her aspirations and goals are to buy a plot of land and build a house and also to build tailoring school. She lives in a rented house and the family does not have access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy new clothes and clothing materials

loans.name: Juamonie

texts.en:
Juamonie is 28 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 
Juamonie has a shop that sells clothing & beauty products from AVON & NATASHA. She has had this business for 4 years. She requested a loan for 11,000 to buy stocks from AVON & NATASHA to sell.
Juamonie has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Juamonie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks from AVON & NATASHA to sell

loans.name: G.s Don Tino Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Don tino, está conformado por emprendedores que se unieron para salir adelante con sus negocios y además se motivan uno a otro. Este grupo ya ha tenido financiamiento con Fundación León 2000, han demostrado ser unas personas responsables y con ganas de seguir adelante. Constantino que es miembro de este grupo están solicitando financiamiento para invertir en su negocio de sastrería en la compra de capital trabajo como hilos, tijeras, telas entre otros.
texts.en: The Don Tino Solidarity Group is made up of enterprising people who joined together to get ahead with their business and who also motivate each other.  This group has already had financing with Fundación León 2000 and they have proven to be responsible people who want to get ahead.  Constantino, who is a member of this group, is asking for financing to invest in his tailoring business by buying working capital, such as thread, scissors, and fabrics, among other things.

loans.use: to buy working capital such as thread, scissors, and fabric, among other things

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is 25 years old and single.She sells second hand clothes and has been in the business for the past four years. She gets a monthly income of KES 15,000 from the business.

This is Sylvia's first term loan in KADET LTD. She will use the loan amount to purchase more stock of clothes for resale. She was introduced to KADET LTD by a client who is already registered.

Sylvia's hope is to increase her income by selling  clothes in a wholesale business.

loans.use: Purchase stock of used clothes for sale .

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Jennifer has a shop that makes & sells snacks like rice cakes & bibingka, a specialty rice cake. She has had this business for 6 years. She has requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.
Jennifer has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, Jennifer hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Carmela

texts.en:
Carmela is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 
Carmela has a shop that makes & sells chicken & pork barbecue during the afternoon. She has had this business for 5 years. She has requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients needed for making barbecue.
Carmela has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future,Carmela hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making barbecue

loans.name: Nena

texts.es: Nena tiene 56 años, es una valiente y emprendedora mujer, tiene seis hijos a quienes le dio educación y ahora son independientes. Actualmente habita en su propia casa en compañía de su esposo Emilio de 56 años,  y con quien tiene la fuerza para poder trabajar mucho y así tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Nena consiste en dos actividades, la primera es de la venta de comida que lo realiza en la vereda de sus casa, y el otro es la venta de productos por catálogos, así como cosmético, perfume o cremas que ofrece a sus clientes. Ella trabaja sola y lo lleva haciendo por más dos años, aunque en ocasiones le resulta pesado, pero sabe que debe continuar para tener mejores ganancias. Ahora su plan es trabajar y progresar. Éste será el crédito número 11 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, ella por su parte se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. Con el monto solicitado de 1,200 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos, además de productos para tener en stock.
texts.en:
Nena is 56 years old. She is a brave and enterprising woman. She has six children to whom she gave an education and now they are independent.

Currently she lives in her own house with her husband of 56 years of age Emilio, and with whom she has the strength to be able to work hard and thus to have a better quality of life.

Nena’s work consists of two activities. The first is selling food that she sells on the footpath of her house, and the other is selling products through catalogs, such as cosmetics, perfumes or creams that she offers to her clients.

She works alone and she has been doing this work for more than 2 years, although sometimes it is heavy work, but she knows that she should continue in order to earn more income. Now her plan is to work and progress.

This will be her 11th loan through MFP, and so she is waiting for its assistance in order to continue with her objectives. She agrees, on her part, once again to complete her payments as in previous loans. With the 1200 soles from the loan she will buy ingredients and supplies, as well as products to have in inventory.

loans.use: to buy raw materials in order to prepare more food, and to buy more cosmetics

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda, de 39 años, es una buena mujer, madre de dos hijos, Yemilet de 12 y el menor Frank de 6 años, son su razón para seguir trabajando. Está casada con Edson de 47 años con quien vive a lado de sus dos hijos en su casa propia. El trabajo de Nilda es muy divertido, ella se encarga de realizar múltiples cosas en su tienda ubicada en su casa, ahí espera a sus clientes con quienes conversa y brinda algunas alternativas para las piñatas, gorros, tarjetas y más accesorios que se usan en la fiesta de cumpleaños. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 3 años, antes de esto trabajaba para otras personas lo cual no le permitía tener buenos ingresos como ella deseaba, ahora le va mucho mejor ya que percibe sus ingresos netos para ella y no tiene que compartir con nadie ya que realiza su trabajo sola. Le esta yendo muy bien y como toda mujer emprendedora tiene metas y sueños que en algún momento le gustaría realizar, pero por ahora solo desea mantener su negocio para seguir juntando el capital suficiente para poder empezar a expandirlo. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mercadería y materiales para poder continuar con su negocio ya que desea aumentar su producción y así tener listo para cumplir la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Thirty-nine-year-old Nilda is a good woman and the mother of two children, 12-year-old Yemilet and they youngest, 6-year-old Frank.  They are her reason for getting ahead.  She is married to 47-year-old Edson, whom she lives with along with her two children in their own home.  Nilda's work is very fun; she is in charge of doing many things in the store located in her home.  That is where she sees her customers, whom she talks to and offers some options for piñatas, hats, cards, and other accessories for birthday parties.  She has been doing this work for three years.  Before this she worked for other people, which didn't allow her to make as much as she wanted to.  Now things are much better as she receives her net earnings and she doesn't have to share them with anyone because she works on her own.  It's going very well for her and, like all enterprising women, she has goals and dreams that she would eventually like to achieve, but for the moment she only wants to maintain her business to keep saving up enough money to be able to expand it.  This will be her third loan with MFP and she counts on their collaboration to be able to carry out her plans.  She also promises to make her payments on time again, as she did with her previous loans.  With the requested 1,500 nuevos soles, she will buy merchandise and materials to be able to continue with her business, as she wants to increase her production to have everything ready to meet her customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy more party items, such as piñatas

loans.name: Seke Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SEKE” iniciará su decimo séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Silveria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: trenzado de mantas, comidera, comerciante de api, elaboración de zapatos, venta de camas, venta de fresco, artesanías.

La señora Silveria,  indica que hace ocho años que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de la asesora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida que viene trabajando hace años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de conservas) que comprará la Ceja  y posteriormente lo venderá en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella tiene tres hijos y esta casada.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y el área de salud.
texts.en:
The SEKE Communal Bank will start their 17th loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Regional Hub.  It is made up of nine members and it is managed by a board of directors headed by Silveria.  The communal bank's members do various kinds of work, such as weaving blankets, selling food, selling the traditional drink, api, shoemaking, selling beds, selling soft drinks, and craftwork.

Silveria tells us that she's been working with Pro Mujer for eight years and that she joined the institution after being invited by their adviser.  She currently has a business selling food that she's had for years.

The loan she is taking out now is to increase her capital to buy canned food in la Ceja that she will later sell at her stand.  This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family, as she is married with three children.

When asked what it is she likes about Pro Mujer, she told us that she likes the training sessions and the health area.

loans.use: to buy provisions

loans.name: Erika Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Erika esta solicitando un crédito para comprar mas ropa, ya que se le termino casi toda y le están solicitando ya ropa de verano, pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la inversión es por eso que solicita su cooperación para este crédito. 
Doña Erika tiene dos años con este pequeño negocio, que le permite solventar algunos gastos y así poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos, ya que el se dedica a la construcción y entre los dos ingresos le están dando una mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Erika is applying for a loan to buy more clothing, as she has run out of almost everything. They are already asking her for summer clothing, but she doesn't have the money necessary for the investment. That's why she is asking for your contribution towards this loan.

Erika has had her small business for two years, which has allowed her to pay some bills, and so be able to help her husband with expenses. He works in construction, and between the two incomes, they are giving their children a better life.

loans.use: To buy clothing merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
El señor Reynaldo desea terminar los acabados del exterior de su vivienda pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material que es cemento, arena y pintura. Solicita el préstamo para poder realizar la mejora ya que con los acabados le dará mas protección  as su bienvenida y ya que el cambio de clima le puede afectar en la salud de su pequeño hijo.
Don Reynaldo trabaja como guardia de seguridad en una compañía de transportes y su esposa es empleada de una compañía como auxiliar de contable. Entre los dos han logrado formar un patrimonio, y tenerlos en muy buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Reynaldo wants to complete the final touches of the exterior of his house but does not have the necessary money in order to buy the materials such as cement, sand and paint. 

He is asking for a loan in order to be able to make the improvements and do the final work in order to give more protection and be welcoming, and because the change of weather can affect the health of his little child. 

Reynaldo works as a security guard in a transport company and his wife is employed in a company as an assistant accountant. Between them they have managed to create assets, and have them in very good condition.

loans.use: to finish the exterior plastering of the walls of the house

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, es comerciante de zapatos, vive con sus tres hijos, es madre soltera, vive en casa alquilada, el negocio lo comenzó por iniciativa propia, lo tiene en la casa donde vive y sale a vender ambulantemente, tiene ya experiencia en  el manejo de las ventas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de calzado en variedad de estilos y colores, la compra le permitirá mejorar el negocio, ya que ofrecerá más variedad a la clientela, para que sus ventas tambien sean mayores.
Su objetivo es crecer en clientes, ya que asi la demanda será mayor y sus ingresos, esto le permitirá prosperar junto a sus hijos, ya que tiene el propósito de apoyarles en los estudios.
texts.en:
María is a shoe dealer. She lives with her three children, is a single mother, and lives in a rented house. She began the business through her own initiative. She has it in the house where she lives and she sells on the street, having experience in working in sales.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy shoes in a variety of styles and colors. The purchase will allow her to improve the business, and offer more variety to her customers, in order that her sales also will be better.

Her object is to grow her client base, as the demand and her income would be higher, and this would permit her to prosper together with her children, as she has as her purpose to support them in their studies.

loans.use: to buy shoes in a variety of styles and colors

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married . 
Bernard has a shop that buys & sells tungsten & gold dust. He has had this business for 6 years. He requested a loan of 8,000 to buy tungsten & other metallic dust with high value .
Bernard has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future, Bernard hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tungsten & other metallic dust with high value

loans.name: Mary Wanjiru

texts.en:
Mary is still married and a mother of four school-age children. Her farming business greatly improved and she is applying for her third loan to enable her to buy farm inputs; fertilizer and seedlings, and to pay for labor.

She hopes to expand her business and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To rent a piece of land and plant potatoes

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 2 children. Rosie has a shop that sells bananas, coconuts & firewood. She has had this business for 3 years.
She requested a loan for 13,000 to buy bananas, coconuts & firewood to sell.
Rosie has been a member of HSPFI since 2008.  In the future, Rosie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas, coconuts & firewood to sell

loans.name: Julie

texts.en: Julie is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married. Julie has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages. Julie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Julie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en: Oliver lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with eight children, and all her children go to school. She has two additional family members (a brother and sister). She sells fresh fruits and vegetables at the market. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works six days a week. She has requested a loan of UGX 1,300,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy fruits and vegetables like mangoes, paw-paws, cabbages, and pineapples. Her major business challenges are perishability, transportation, and seasonality. Her aspirations and goals are to buy a plot of land and build a house and also to start selling wholesale only. She lives in a rented house, and the family does not have access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fruits and vegetables like mangoes, pawpaws , cabbages, and pineapples

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 55 años, es una mujer buena y trabajadora, es madre soltera de una hija de 24 años llamada Paola, viven juntas en su casa propia junto a sus padres. Ella trabaja mucho para así ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Norma, tiene un trabajo muy bueno, ella tiene la tarea de diseñar, coser y remendar prendas de vestir. En su casa tiene un pequeño taller en donde realiza todo este trabajo, al mismo tiempo tiene un negocio de venta de golosinas al cual se dedica de manera paralela. Lleva 20 años realizando éste negocio y trabaja sola ya que durante todo este tiempo se acostumbró a realizarlo así. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, ya que le permite disponer de tiempo para poder dedicar a su hogar y hacer algunas tareas que necesita. Al principio tenía muchas dificultades pues conocer todo relacionado al negocio, además que le faltaba capital para invertir. Con el tiempo fue formándose y poco a poco fue aprendiendo, es así que ahora le va mucho mejor y puede seguir con sus sueños de crecer y ampliar su taller. Este será el crédito número 12 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que todos estos años pudo trabajar a lado de personas muy responsables y que no permitieron que se desintegre. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 soles, comprará materiales y accesorios de costura para seguir con su trabajo, además implementará su puesto comprando más golosinas, pues sus clientes le piden variedad.
texts.en: Norma, who is 55 years old, is a good woman and very hard working. She is a single mother of one 24 year old daughter named Paola. They live together in their own house next to her parents. She works a lot to provide a better quality of life for her family. Norma has a very good job, doing the designing, sewing and mending of clothes. She works out of a small workshop in her house. At the same time, she also maintains a candy store. She has been running these businesses for twenty years. She has been working by herself this whole time and is now accustomed to working that way. She really likes what she does, as it provides her time to to care for her household and take care of some tasks that she needs to attend to while running her businesses. At the beginning, she had many difficulties learning everything related to the business. Moreover, she was lacking capital to invest in her business. With time, she was able to teach herself and kept learning. Because of this, now it is going much better and she can follow her dreams of growing and expanding her workshop. This will be her twelfth loan with MFP. Norma is very happy to know that all these years she could work with very responsible people and they didn't allow her to fall by the wayside. With a loan of 2000 soles, she will buy sewing materials and accessories to continue with her work. She will also buy more sweets for her candy business because her clients ask for variety.

loans.use: buy sewing materials, as well as sweets.

loans.name: Expedita

texts.en:
Expedita is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated with two children. 

Expedita has a shop that sells snacks and homemade sausage. She has been in business for six years. 

She is requesting a loan for 11,000 to buy raw ingredients for making snacks and sausage.

Expedita has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Expedita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks & home made sausage.

loans.name: Juvelyn

texts.en:
Juvelyn is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. 

Juvelyn has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages.  She has been in business for 3 years.  She requests a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Juvelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Juvelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell.

loans.name: Merrylou

texts.en:
Merrylou is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Merrylou has a shop that sells fish, like sardines, trout and milk fish.  She has had this business for 2 years.  She requests a loan for 9,000 PHP to buy fish for sell.

Merrylou has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Merrylou hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish for sell.

loans.name: Jingy

texts.en:
Jingy is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 

Jingy provides manicure and pedicure services. She has had this business for 5 years.  She requests a loan of 7,000 PHP to buy materials needed to perform manicures and pedicures.

Jingy has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Jingy hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for manicure & pedicure.

loans.name: Fausta

texts.en:
Fausta lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is widowed with five children, and all go to school. 

She sells second hand clothes at the market and has been in this business for the last 10 years.  She works six days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy bales of second hand clothes.  Her major business challenges are transportation and seasonality.  Her aspirations and goals are to start importing second hand clothes, buy a plot of land and build a house.  She lives in her own house and her family does not have access to electricity nor piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated with 5 children. 

Eva has a shop that sells used clothing, like shirts & blouses. She has had this business for 1 year.  She requests a loan for 4,000 PHP to buy stocks of used clothing for sell.

Eva has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Eva hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of used clothing for sell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Gina has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 8,000 Philippines pesos to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Gina has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Gina hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.en:
Esperanza is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated with 3 children.
